post_text: When GTA biology students learned that their teacher is color blind and corrective glasses are available (but costly), they pooled their funds and turned to social media and word of mouth to raise enough to buy him a pair. They presented them to him yesterday while wearing red and green, which he can now see accurately! Thank you, Melissa and Kiera, for spearheading this effort, and to the entire group (including Anabelle, Mandy, Elaina, Mason, Liza and Maddy) for your Caring and Initiative - two of the character traits we emphasize at GTA.
